title: My laptop won't turn on
description: I have a Dell XPS 13 and it suddenly won't power on. I plugged in the charger, but there's no light or sound.

title: Weird beeping when I start my computer
description: Every time I power on my Lenovo ThinkPad, it makes a few loud beeps and nothing shows up. I don’t know what that means.

title: Monitor keeps turning black randomly
description: My Dell monitor goes black for a few seconds and then comes back. I tried reconnecting the HDMI cable but it didn't help.

title: Keyboard isn't working on my Surface
description: I attached the keyboard cover to my Surface Pro 7 but it doesn't respond when I type. I restarted it and nothing changed.

title: My external hard drive is clicking
description: I connected my Seagate hard drive and it just makes a clicking sound. It doesn't show up on my computer at all.

title: Printer says it's ready but won’t print
description: My HP LaserJet shows it's online and has ink, but every time I try to print, nothing comes out. I've restarted it a few times.

title: Laptop fan is super loud all the time
description: My HP EliteBook fan runs loud constantly, even when I'm just browsing the web. It’s really distracting.

title: Mouse keeps disconnecting randomly
description: My Logitech MX Master keeps freezing for a few seconds and then starts working again. I tried using a different USB port but it’s the same.

title: Touchscreen stopped working
description: The touchscreen on my Dell laptop used to work fine, but now it doesn't respond at all. I haven’t dropped it or anything.

title: Screen backlight flickers at low brightness
description: When I lower the brightness on my Lenovo Yoga, the screen starts flickering. It’s fine at full brightness.

title: Battery is draining way too fast
description: My MacBook Pro loses charge really quickly, like from 100% to 30% in under two hours. I'm just using basic apps.

title: My second screen isn't working
description: I connected my second monitor using HDMI, but my laptop isn't detecting it. I even restarted everything but no luck.

title: Burning smell from my PC
description: I smelled something weird, kind of like burning plastic, coming from the back of my desktop. I shut it down immediately.

title: Keys are missing from my keyboard
description: Some of the keys on my laptop keyboard just popped off. I don't know how to put them back or if they’re broken.

title: Laptop stuck in a BIOS loop
description: I updated the BIOS on my HP laptop and now it just restarts over and over. I can't get to Windows.

title: Webcam isn't being detected anymore
description: My webcam used to work in Teams, but now it's like it doesn’t exist. It’s not even in Device Manager.

title: Laptop hinge is coming loose
description: The hinge on my laptop is starting to come apart. It still opens and closes, but it’s getting worse every day.

title: My screen is cracked after a small drop
description: I dropped my Surface from the sofa and now there’s a crack across the screen. It still works but looks bad.

title: The dock isn’t charging my laptop
description: I plugged my HP laptop into the docking station, but it’s not charging. I double-checked the cable and power source.

title: Strange lines on the display
description: My monitor has weird vertical lines on the screen that won't go away. I tried a different cable but it’s still there.

title: USB ports not working
description: None of the USB ports on my Dell laptop are working anymore. I tried plugging in my phone and mouse, nothing happens.

title: Projector not turning on
description: I tried turning on the Epson projector in Room 204 and nothing happened. I checked the power cable and outlet.

title: SSD not showing up in BIOS
description: I installed a new SSD in my desktop but it's not showing up in BIOS. I reseated it twice already.

title: Noise coming from inside laptop
description: I hear a faint grinding noise coming from inside my Lenovo laptop. Not sure if it’s the fan or something else.

title: Laptop keeps shutting down suddenly
description: My laptop just powers off out of nowhere even if the battery is full. It’s happened 3 times today.

title: Can't eject USB drive
description: I try to eject my USB drive but it says it's in use, even when nothing is open. I’m worried about losing files.

title: Built-in speakers not working
description: No sound comes out of my laptop speakers. I checked the volume and device settings but still nothing.

title: Laptop gets very hot even when idle
description: Even when I’m not doing anything, my laptop gets really warm. I’m not sure if the fan is broken.

title: Can't power on docking station
description: The docking station for my Dell laptop doesn’t seem to be powering on. None of the connected devices light up.

title: Random black screen while working
description: My screen just goes black for a second and comes back. It’s random and happens several times a day.

title: The fingerprint scanner isn't responding
description: I used to log in with my fingerprint but now nothing happens when I touch the sensor. I didn’t change anything.

title: Laptop not charging beyond 80%
description: My ThinkPad won’t charge above 80%. I tried different outlets and chargers but same thing.

title: Built-in camera very blurry
description: The image from my laptop webcam is super blurry. I cleaned the lens but it didn’t help.

title: Hard drive makes loud buzzing sound
description: My desktop's hard drive makes a loud buzz when it's running. I’m afraid it’s about to fail.

title: Mouse pointer jumps around
description: My external mouse is acting weird. The pointer jumps all over the place even when I’m not moving it.

title: Laptop won’t wake from sleep
description: When I close the lid and open it later, the screen stays black. I have to do a hard reboot every time.

title: Battery percentage stuck at 56%
description: My MacBook battery has been stuck at 56% for over an hour. It’s plugged in and says charging.

title: Display has yellow tint
description: Everything on my monitor has a yellowish color. I tried adjusting settings but it doesn’t go away.

title: Ethernet port seems loose
description: The Ethernet cable won’t stay in the port properly. It falls out with the slightest movement.

title: Laptop shuts down when unplugged
description: As soon as I unplug my HP laptop, it shuts down even though it says battery is 100%.

title: Volume buttons not working
description: The volume keys on the keyboard don’t do anything anymore. I can still change it from the tray.

title: Bluetooth keeps turning off
description: I connect my wireless headset but it keeps disconnecting after a few minutes. Bluetooth just shuts off on its own.

title: Laptop trackpad stopped clicking
description: My trackpad still moves the pointer but clicking doesn’t register unless I tap. I used to press down on it.

title: No power light on charging
description: When I plug in my charger, there’s no light or sound. I’ve tried different outlets but still nothing.

title: Laptop makes popping sound from speaker
description: There’s a random popping noise coming from the left speaker. It’s really distracting during calls.

title: USB-C port isn’t charging my phone
description: I used to charge my phone through my laptop's USB-C port but now it doesn’t work. Tried different cables.

title: The screen is way too dim
description: My laptop screen is super dark even though I turned the brightness all the way up.

title: Laptop won’t shut down completely
description: When I shut down my computer, the screen turns off but the fan and lights stay on until I hold the power button.

title: My laptop is really warm
description: Laptop is hot to the touch

title: My drive is disappearing
description: my hard drive keeps disappearing from my pc, it happens randomly

title: i need a headset
description: this friday please

title: My laptop no longer works
description: i dropped my laptop on the way to work and it wont turn on
